Sentencas: in this paper, the effects of aluminum on the microstructure, mechanical properties, and high temperature dual atmosphere tolerance of silver and silver-copper oxide filler metals were investigated.
Titulo: Mechanical properties and dual atmosphere tolerance of Ag-Al based braze

Sentencas: It was found that joints brazed with binary Ag-Al braze foils containing more than 2 at% Al retained a metallic form of aluminum within the metallic braze filler matrix after brazing at 1000 degrees C in air.
Titulo: Mechanical properties and dual atmosphere tolerance of Ag-Al based braze

Sentencas: The bend strengths of these joints decreased with increasing aluminum content due to the formation of interfacial aluminum oxide.
Titulo: Mechanical properties and dual atmosphere tolerance of Ag-Al based braze

Sentencas: However, the existence of metallic aluminum in the braze filler matrix appeared to enhance the high-temperature dual atmosphere tolerance of the silver-based braze filler, which displayed measurably less porosity after 1000h of exposure at 800 degrees C in a dual reducing/oxidizing atmosphere environment than unalloyed silver.
Titulo: Mechanical properties and dual atmosphere tolerance of Ag-Al based braze

Sentencas: A series of binary and ternary braze pastes based on the Ag-Al(-Cu) system were also formulated as potential pSOFC (planar solid oxide fuel cell) sealants.
Titulo: Mechanical properties and dual atmosphere tolerance of Ag-Al based braze

Sentencas: Model alumina joints brazed with these pastes exhibited an increase in bend strength with increasing copper content.
Titulo: Mechanical properties and dual atmosphere tolerance of Ag-Al based braze

Sentencas: However, unlike the binary Ag-Al filler metals, the ternary compositions often retained no protective metallic aluminum after brazing.
Titulo: Mechanical properties and dual atmosphere tolerance of Ag-Al based braze

Sentencas: Thus, while the addition of copper improves filler metal wettability and, therefore, joint strength in the Ag-Al alloys, it appears to reduce the dual atmosphere tolerance of these filler metals.
Titulo: Mechanical properties and dual atmosphere tolerance of Ag-Al based braze

Sentencas: Published by Elsevier Ltd. on behalf of international Association for Hydrogen Energy.
Titulo: Mechanical properties and dual atmosphere tolerance of Ag-Al based braze
